section.p: Throwing open the door, you shiver as a gust of wind blows cold drizzle in your face. ‘Well, hurry up and enter, then!’ you call out irritably.
‘Thank you,’ says a tall gentleman in a cloak. He sweeps past you into the room, showing a smile with rather too many sharp white teeth, and waits for you to close the door.
You have a nasty feeling about this. You cannot reach your belongings (including armour and weapons) because the stranger is standing between you and the hearth.
